website_summaries.verdict: Runners stated that the 16th version of the Brooks Adrenaline GTS mostly delivered. They felt that this versatile running shoe was durable, that its cushioning systems were comfortable, and that its pronation control feature was effective. Also, the accommodating width choices made it easy for consumers to get a more relaxed fit. Still, some complained that the coverage felt uncomfortable, and that the mid-sole felt unwieldy.
pros: The segmented design of the crash pad assisted in cushioning the landing impact, many runners noted
Those who have tried the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 16 generally agreed that it felt lightweight
‘Comfortable’ was a word that runners listed as a part of this model’s ‘Pros’
A lot of users stated that the mid-sole unit was able to support the arch and correct over-pronation
According to a lot of reviewers, this running shoe felt true to its size
Many testers appreciated the fact that this version came in different widths—narrow, medium, wide and extra wide
Some runners were able to use it on both the pavement and on light trails
they didn’t feel short-changed in terms of performance and durability
There were reviewers who wrote that the materials used in this running shoe were reliable and consistent
cons: A tester felt that it had too much padding
it caused some discomfort to their feet
The mid-sole unit felt stiff for one runner
The toe box was narrow for several runners
the fabrics rubbed uncomfortably against the toes, resulting in blisters

customer_reviews.title: Tried and trusted £35 bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this model in its various releases for some time so had no concerns over size or fit. I did find this version - 16 - a little hard to start with but that might be because the other 2 pairs I'm using are well broken in. They are fine after a few miles. I picked these up on Amazon for £35 which is an absolute bargain - colour isn't that exciting but whose arguing for that price.
customer_reviews.author: ScootCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Love these runners, super comfy! I went for the mens size 7 as the womens are always narrow fitting. I don't expect mens size 7 runners to be in pink so I won't compain about the colour.....
customer_reviews.author: S. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: No more blisters!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in the hope of slowing down on blisters and general discomfort after running 10 miles or more. I'm normally size 8.5 but went for size 9 and these fit as expected. Medium width. Probably not ideal to wear a brand new pair of trainers for 13.1miles but I did just that today and my feet feel great. No new blisters! They feel very stable and provide a good grip even on wet surface. Look forward to doing many more miles in them. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mazik

customer_reviews.title: A change for the worse.
customer_reviews.text: A change for the worse because I loved the previous models fit ( size 8) which is now at least a half size larger or has the wrong label in I, and also (more importantly for me) the renown cushioning has all but disappeared. To say these shoes are hard on the heel is an understatement. I can press the inboard cushioning on the previous model but on these?. No way. They're really hard and I think suitable for very heavy runners not a 66kg person like me. Very disappointed and will look for a 15 version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Products of Brooks are always trustful! In terms of size, it fits perfectly. The shoes took a short while to break in thought.
customer_reviews.author: kEE

customer_reviews.title: Have worn Brooks for the last few years and these were a good replacement for my Vapor 2s that
customer_reviews.text: At last a pair of running shoes/trainers that are suitable as "normal" wear too rather than being black/lime green and electric pink! Have worn Brooks for the last few years and these were a good replacement for my Vapor 2s that died
customer_reviews.author: Jon Housley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife's been wearing these for years to run. Won't wear any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent if you have any gait problems like pronating
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Excellent if you have any gait problems like pronating. I am female with wide feet and find these a perfect fit (femaile' version not really wide fit).
customer_reviews.author: Offira

customer_reviews.title: Bring on The Great North Run now i have this years new Running ...
customer_reviews.text: Bring on The Great North Run now i have this years new Running shoes. great fit and expected comfort from a new running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Terry Smithies

customer_reviews.title: Encouraging a reluctant runner to get fit again!
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet (large big toe joint) and the right shoe is currently rubbing a bit. It will give as they wear in - and then the seam will go as that's what my feet do to all shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good this is my second pair of Brooks running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: James J Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product!!! the best running trainers I ve ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used brooks since I endured calf strains. The GTS range have helped prevent as much injuries
customer_reviews.author: steven gault

customer_reviews.title: but trainers are fine albeit not my favourite colour
customer_reviews.text: Maybe needed half a size bigger, but trainers are fine albeit not my favourite colour!
customer_reviews.author: dickie eng

customer_reviews.title: ... times in the past and they are always a good
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this style of running shoe several times in the past and they are always a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Have had to buy a half size bigger than normal. Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit just right said Goldilocks.
customer_reviews.text: Why do you now want me to write a review after I have filled in what you wanted me to and done so quite happily. They are a good fit, which is what I clocked on above so surely people know that. They are a pretty colour and I can run in them which is handy as they are,running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect in style and comfort cons
customer_reviews.text: pros: Its perfect in style and comfort cons:width is somewhat narrow, lack of 2e choices
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Adrenaline Gts 16 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These trusted, go-to running shoes for men, the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 16, are the perfect balance of support and soft cushion. Element mesh is a moisture-managing, breathable mesh upper. Adjustable saddle construction allows for a personalized and secure midfoot fit. The midsole dynamically adapts to every step thanks to the dna midsole, while your body is guided into it's natural alignment with the help of a supportive progressive diagonal rollbar. Plus, smooth heel-to-toe transitions are made possible by the full-length segmented crash pad. This sixteenth edition is more plush than ever - an updated v-groove folds deeper inward to absorb and disperse impact away from the foot.
feature_bullets: Surface: Road. Differential: 12 mm. Limited Edition Colors: The bustling transit patchwork of the Underground London Tubes comes to life on the Rapid Transit (Electric Blue/High Risk Red/Black/Cyber Yellow), in a theme influenced by the London Marathon. The all-American-themed plaid and subtle, nautical-inspired print accents of the Nantucket (Poppy Red/Peacoat Navy/Strong) perfectly capture the coastal culture of the eastern seaboard, in a design influenced by the Boston Marathon. Vibrant retro
Let the scenery become one big blur as you dial in your stride with the Brooks® Adrenaline GTS 16 running shoe underfoot!
